title: LFM> Clan name being decided Join now
body:
HI

Trying to make a ranked team here PM if interested there's 3 of us now met 2 of them online they're bot decent players name is still decent suggestions for name as well might be Fyren Iosnia since the other guy suggested it

2nd guy: Support
3rd guy: Fill as long as its not ADC

1 more!

replies.body: im keen, i play top or mid :D

adc/jungle. can fill support.

sign me up.
Okie! I'll send you a friend req
